website_summaries.verdict: More of a storage solution than an actual chair or bean bag, but definitely worth considering if your home is overrun with stuffed animals.
pros: Multi-purpose design that features space-saving interior storage for blankets, stuffed animals, and more
Durable stitching is superior to similar items and thicker fabric does a good job holding a uniform shape
Available in a variety of attractive patterns and colors
cons: Not surprisingly, seating can be a little lumpy
Needs to be well-filled to form a convincing bean bag shape

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a lot of stuffed animals
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hates to part with stuffed animals. We had one of those corner nets (that was full), her twin bed (was full) and more lying around. I ordered the XL and was worried not all would fit still. This has been able to fit THEM ALL. A full net, a twin bed covered and more lying around. Best part is there is still space. It is easier for her to get to them as the corner nets I would have to help. Easy to put them all away. Conveniently zips right up. It bit funny when a doll that makes noise is sat on... but overall this is a great way to keep them all but hide them all.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very happy! Great product and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Received a week ago but just being able to use it since we are moving. Bought this for my 13 yr old daughter since she didn't want the hammock hanging anymore. This thing is so HUGE we have to find even more stuffed animals around the house to put inside! She loves it and loves the color! Great idea especially for a growing teen. Very happy and recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to all the stuffed animals!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 kids and way too many stuffies. This bean bag was the PERFECT solution. The kids had oodles of fun cramming all their stuffed animals into the bag and I was amazed at how many they crammed in there. Now all the stuffed animals are contained and we have a comfy bean bag chair to lounge in. The kids are able to easily unzip the chair and take out their animals when they want to play, but it's so nice to have them all go back at the end of the day. I might have to order a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Stuffed Animal Storage Ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son's toys were all shoved in the corner of his room in a big pile. I also had his Cars blanket and a sleeping bad folded on the floor next to them. With the extra large beanbag cover we were able to fit all of his animals, the two blankets and even have room to add some more animals! It looks so organized and the zipper has a great "gripper"so he can open and close it himself. The zipper is also really nice quality and runs very smoothly! Another amazing bonus is the handle! You can pick it up and move it around with ease!!! Best thing I have ever found to store his animals in!! Absolutely LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Less clutter is a bonus
customer_reviews.text: We love these bags/chairs! My kids hate picking up their stuffed animals, but when these arrived, they ran up to their rooms and started stuffing them full. And just like that, there was a lot less clutter in their rooms. The material is a durable canvas that is also comfortable for cuddling up against. The kids always used to fight over the best seat on the couch, but now that they have their own individual “seats” that they can position wherever they choose, there’s a bit less whining at our house. I even caught my cat catching a nap on one when the kids were at school! A+ product.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Great organizing tool
customer_reviews.text: First time trying out a project like this and I really like it! I bought the large size listed and am glad that I did. My kids have lots of stuffed animals and they love EVERY SINGLE ONE:) They just can't keep control of them all. This is a great solution. The largest size is estimated to fit 90 stuffed toys and is made of a sturdy canvas type material. I purchased the white and pink striped one and it's true to color and pretty in person. My daughters love theirs and we have no more clutter. It's large enough for 2 kids to sit side by side on top. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: srutter89Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It's the best way to store so many stuffed animals!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect use for ALL of those stuffed animals! I easily fit 25 stuffed animals in the bag, probably with room for more. My kids love it and find it extremely comfortable to sit or lay on. They love that I didn't actually get rid of any of their things. So win-win for me! They are hidden and neat, and my kids still get to keep all of their stuffed animals. I have one more bin of stuffed animals to clear out...and my kids have already requested I get another one of these bags for them.
customer_reviews.author: KRuss

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, this will depend on what you fill it with. If you have a bunch of beanie babies it will fill out evenly. If you have a bunch of circus/carnival stuffed animals you are going to get a misshapen lump. It does the job nicely, though, and cleans up the room so it isn't covered in stuffed animals. My 7 year-old loves it because he feels like he has a bean bag chair in his room that he can sit on. I should have bought one size smaller because the extra large is bigger than I thought and he doesn't have that many stuffed animals (thank goodness). It is a solid design with durable material and zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. We had a lot of Squishmellows made by KellyToy - we stuffed the bag as much as we could and it made a fun beanbag. Gave the whole thing to my nieces. Fit 3 large squishmellows and ~25 of the medium ones... still filled it with a few other items like throw blankets. My sister and her kids move that bag from one room to another after and toss it in the washer and dryer when it gets dirty... sometimes her kids get inside the bag too... lol
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Multi-functional and fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! Bought two of these for our too-small-for-real-furniture-playroom and they’re fantastic. The extra large size is huge. Ours is stuffed with two totes full of stuffed animals and some blankets. Only downside is that if it isn’t completely full, the large one is super wide and completely useless as a beanbag. However, ours is never really less than full. We’ve also got one small one, and that still holds a ton. A middle size would be ideal. Either way, both are super sturdy and hold up to my boys. Fabric is thick and colors are super bold.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This bag works perfectly for stuffed animals and keeps the bedroom clutter-free (at least of animals)! Tag on bag says hand wash only, but the description says machine-washable. I e-mailed Creative QT about it and, not only did I get a response very quickly (and professionally), I was assured it was in fact machine-washable.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Z

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for PRACTICAL stuffed toy organization!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I finally bought this! My mom bought this a few months back for my daughters stuffed toy collection at her house, and I thought it was genius. I finally bought one for our house, the largest size, and am so glad I did. The material is durable, and the zipper feels sturdy too. It also has a very convenient strap for moving it around easier. Our never played with stuffed toys (that I didn’t want to throw out just yet) are now out to use by being a comfy chair for my toddler that she uses every day! This is also good for extra blankets if you don’t have a crazy stuffed toy collection.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke as soon as I unboxed it and unzipped it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, heavier than expected
customer_reviews.text: IT seems really well made. Sturdy zipper, thick fabric. For some reason I wasn't expecting it to be so heavy once it was stuffed. We were able to fill it with all of the soft stuffed animals (we left out any with electronics or hard heads) and had a lite extra room left for some baby blankets we dont use anymore and a pillow. It is STUFFED full.... kind of hard to sit on full so may need to take a few things out so we can shape it into a seat better. The kids love it and all want their own!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Seriously amazing space saving product.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously amazing space saving product. I ended up buying two...one to store guest bedroom linens and the other stuffed animals. Its crazy how much can be stored in these. I took photos of them filled, then dumped it all out so you can see how much was actually stuffed in them. My sons playroom has great new seats and the choas is neatly zipped up. I had my 7 yr old squish the bag as I zipped it up. Worked amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Betterfli

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot and well made
customer_reviews.text: This thing holds so much! I had a tub (type that can fit a keg inside) PACKED with stuffed animals. This thing fit all of those, plus more that were on my daughter’s bed, PLUS extra blankets. She loves dragging it to the living room to lay on and watch movies, and I love that her closet and bed are now clear. I bought a second for my son’s room in gray stripe. This would work for older people as well, apartments, dorms etc. You could fit a thick comforter, sleeping bag, and extra pillows inside. No gripes about the design and the zipper seems high quality and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and useful storage for kids room!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how sturdy the storage “bean bag” is. The material is very thick but somehow soft! I bought two, the blue circle and grey with flowers in the regular size. They aren’t huge and not big enough for an adult to lounge in, but for 6yr olds it’s great. They jam all their stuffed animals in and they can lounge around the house. I thought the bag was full the other day and there were some larger stuffed animals laying around and I managed to jam all of them into the bag and it seemed like there was plenty more space! I’m sure the larger bags would hold a body!! Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Best invention EVER
customer_reviews.text: Out of sight out of mind...my kids do not even mind putting their most favorite stuffed animals in here. I had vacuum sealed a huge portion of their stuffed animals, however, got frustrated when they would open it just to get one of them and then the bags wouldn't stay sealed after a few times of opening and closing again. This way they have full access to it but love the fact that it serves as a seat - probably comfort to them knowing it is close by still. I do have to add I personally sit in them (I have two) while waiting for them to do their nightly routines and putting them to bed, REALLY comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but can be lumpy.
customer_reviews.text: I do love this idea! It had cleared a lot of stuffed animals from my daughters room but I guess this isn’t a product fault but I didn’t think about how lumpy it would make it. She doesn’t sit on it very often because the different shapes and hardness of the stuffed animals make it kind of awkward. It’s a very cute idea for a play room or somewhere it’d just be more of an aesthetically pleasing piece rather than functional.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Plastic zipper not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke soon after we bought it...i was able to fix it several times. But now its completely broken. I have a very disappointed girl.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey spychalski

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is thick and seemed like it would hold up
customer_reviews.text: My first impression was that these seemed to be decent quality. The fabric is thick and seemed like it would hold up. Unfortunately the same cannot be said for the cheap plastic zippers! I ordered these less than 3 months ago and we now have one that is a $32 piece of fabric. The zipper completely broke. The bag wasn't overstuffed and my daughter didn't even get in and out of that often. Apparently my return period has expired so now it's just a complete waste of money. Not happy. Save your money and look for one with a better quality zipper.
customer_reviews.author: AZKat

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a lifesaver. My daughter has way too many stuffed animals and made the room look messy. It's huge!!! (It's super heavy when filled all the way lol) She has a loft bed and it fits under the bed nicely and she loves laying on it and relaxing while watching TV. Let's just say, she has one of each of those My Little Pony's from Build a Bear and they all fit, plus so many others. I was incredibly surprised by how many fit inside. It's durable too because I've had to carry it upstairs with the handle a couple of times and it's held up nicely. And she's dragged it around the house a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. My daughter is obssessed with stuffed animals and plushies...and honestly they were overwhelming filling her room and spilling out if her toy bins. This is life changing and room saving. I put all of the plushies she doesnt really play with that often in there and put them in the basement in her play area and it disguises really well...its so full that she really can't sit on it..but it is huge and holds a ton.
customer_reviews.author: NHA

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best storages I’ve ever purchased! I bought two of these, one for each child. They have an attachment to stuffed animals. We all know you can’t keep every single one they won at a carnival or got for a gift. This allows them to store a lot of them. I have a rule, one out, one in. This keeps stuffed animals under control. They even been adding more because they want their bags fluffier! This bag is made from a thick, sturdy material. Even has a great zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Kasch

customer_reviews.title: Well made and functional.
customer_reviews.text: The Stuffed Animal Storage Bean Bag chair seems well made and sturdy (my daughter dumped all the toys out, climbed in, zipped herself up and rolled around on the floor and it did not come apart....). It is great for hiding all the toys my kids love but never actually play with.... I just wish it was a bit bigger and came in more colors / patterns. I think the flower pattern is kinda ugly, but my daughter loves it. I actually ordered a second one in the blue stripes to store a bunch of extra bedding in our guest room / TV room.
customer_reviews.author: H. Day

customer_reviews.title: Very large but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for all of my kids stuffed animals and I still haven’t even filled it yet. They had at least 50+ stuffed animals of all different sizes and there is still room for plenty more. It keeps the stuffed animals out of sight and gives them somewhere to sit and want movies too. And then if they want a stuffed animal out of the bag they just unzip, grab, and zip back up. It’s that easy!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Hare

customer_reviews.title: Works so well.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. If you have an over abundance of stuffed animals and a child who has special memories with every one and won’t get rid of any this is the answer. I had my daughters stuffed animals under her bed in baskets before this and she could never enjoy them because it was such a pain to get to them. With this she can open the bag anytime and dump them out to play and then stuffs them back in and then it’s perfect for her to sit on to read.
customer_reviews.author: Nikoliko

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical, but this is great !
customer_reviews.text: This held way more animals than expected. I had to supplement with a pillow and a couple blankets, although I'm sure as holidays and birthdays continue, we will need/want that room. I was skeptical that this thing would look like a beanbag, as opposed to a lumpy blob, given what we are stuffing it with, but it created a pretty structured shape. As far as comfortability, my daughter loves it. When I lay on it, I can definitely feel the different animals, but it's not overly uncomfortable and that's pretty expected that you would feel some lumps.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Get organized...get this bean bag!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a bean bag to get my kids when I stumbled upon this item. I ordered it not expecting much because it was pretty inexpensive. The Extra Large size is really big. At first, I was worried we didn't have enough stuffed animals to fill up 2 of them but we used a couple of pillows and had no problem at all. This is a great way to manage the stuffed animals that are growing out of control in your house without just getting rid of them. The kids know where they are but for the most part, just enjoy sitting on them in their own chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Loved This BUT Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: This was immediately a lifesaver to me and my kiddos. I have 4 kids all of which LOVE stuffys. So I'm constantly going crazy with no go way to store all the stuffys. The kids loved having one place for all of them and loved dragging this seat around and reading books in it. The material is great but the zipper is very cheap, it kept separating in the middle band I would have to fix it. The constant pressure on the zipper handle from having to fix it when the zipper would open in the middle eventually caused the handle on the zipper to break too. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nature Mama

customer_reviews.title: Zipper
customer_reviews.text: This product is very useful and has been used for a year before the zipper broke. I like the color, style, and size. It will cost more to replace the zipper than to purchase a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by the bean bag cover. It is made of thick canvas-like material and has a heavy duty zipper. The colors are bright (I got the green stripe and flower). Definitely amazed at how many stuffed animals I could fit in each. Such a great idea! My kid's rooms look so much better and they're happy they didn't have to get rid of any animals. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: celticmommie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, practical, and our kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these for stuffed animal storage for our kid’s playroom and they loved it so much I ordered a second. It’s well made and sturdy, and a lot more useful than a bunch of stuffed animals stuffed into baskets all over the place. We have 2 of the standard size bags and they hold all of their stuffed animals plus a few small blankets. Our kids are 4 and 8 and they both sit comfortably in these. They also use them as foot stools when they sit in their saucer chairs.
customer_reviews.author: CCF7

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to store my daughters growing stuffed animal collection. I really didn't like the idea of putting holes in the wall to hang one of those nets, plus I don't love the way those look. I bought the extra large and almost all her stuffed animals are inside with a good bit of room for more. She has a few stuffed animals that have hard battery packs so I didn't put those ones inside, but just having 90% of her stuffed animals put away made a huge difference! The bag is great quality, very heavy and very durable and you can tell it is very well made!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of bean bag and buy this instead
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! It is HUGE and the fabric feels durable. Zipper seems really strong as well. We fit way more inside than we thought, and still have room for more. Although we intended to only use it to store stuffed animals, we figured it would also be a great place to store the backup sheets, blankets, and pillows. That way we have more storage space, and the seat is still comfortable. We plan to buy 3 more for the rest of the kids and get rid of the old bean bag chairs that always go flat. Delivery was fast and product was packaged nicely. Highly recommend product!
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe how many stuff animals this thing could hold! My 6 year old son has a love of all things stuff animals but it's driving Mom crazy. So what's a Mom to do? I search Amazon and found this bean bag chair. I thought, how many stuff animals could this thing fit? Well, I found my answer when it arrived......A LOT! I'm pleasantly pleased. The only problem is that I bought two because I thought we would need an extra one for all the stuff animals but one was sufficient. Now I have to return the other one. But that was a nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonSand

customer_reviews.title: Big!
customer_reviews.text: This is huge! Way bigger than I thought. We have found that despite all the animals and blankets it’s not as comfy as a normal bean bag. Everything compresses and it’s not as comfortable. It’s stiff. But it’s cute 🤷🏽‍♀️ So... for the price it’s ok!
customer_reviews.author: Rbon80

customer_reviews.title: We liked it a lot
customer_reviews.text: We liked it a lot, however, after only a month or so, the zipper broke and won't zip anymore :( Very disappointing, as we loved it.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: I love this innovative way to hide stuffed toys and was ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this innovative way to hide stuffed toys and was never sold on stuffed toys displayed in a corner net or the bed. I was amazed at the size. We didn't have enough stuffed toys (I thought we did!) so I also used it to store extra blankets. My husband who like cotton and soft pillows feels the material is rough and scratchy however I see the canvas material strong to constant bouncing/sitting/carrying which is expected of regular wear and tear from energetic children. I say I'm satisfied and it's a great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: BlueRiver

customer_reviews.title: Huge! Hide all the stuffies.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 38" bag for my son. It is AWESOME and huge. We have this huge stuffed caterpillar (approximately 1.5' w x 7' long), it fit along with smaller 6' Caterpillar, two pillow pets and a host of other stuffed animals. I cannot believe that all the stuffed animals fit. His closet floor is now visible for the first time in 2 years. The carrying handle let's him drag the bean bag all over the room. We've only been using for a few days but has held up so far to jumps off the couch and off his bed for hours on end with no damage to seams or zipper. Green color is bright, cheery and gender neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F. Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product- clever concept! We have 2 of these and we love them. I give four stars instead of 5 because the zipper is a constant struggle. It gets snagged, comes undone and if there is enough pressure, it will just split wide open. Kids are obviously going to sit on it so the zipper needs to be more durable for the pressure it will endure.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Hardy

customer_reviews.title: OMG this is incredible
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Got one for my daughters room it was bigger then I expected, she had an absurd amount of stuffed animals and I didn’t think it would fit all of them when I bought it, but it fit every one plus still got room, comfortable for her to sit and lay on and read books, will work for years to come, material looks good and feels good and feels really durable. Extremely happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: sj0524

customer_reviews.title: Great stuffed animal storage
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews about smells & or cheap zippers but I have to admit this one shocked me. The zipper is heavy duty, the material reminds me on canvas and it holds a ton of stuffed animals. I got 2, one for my daughter 7 y/o and one for my son 2y/o. They both love that clean up is easy and they can lay on them. Both look great in the rooms and play room.
customer_reviews.author: Cristi

customer_reviews.title: Love it - way bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I think I ordered the large and it’s huge! Honestly I imagined it being a cute beanbag that held like 1/3 of our stuffies. All of my daughters stuffies are in there and there’s still plenty of room for more. She’s happy though. Aside from it actually being too big, it feels really quality and is super cute
customer_reviews.author: readwritegrow

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for stuff animals
customer_reviews.text: My boys are still in love with their stuff animals which are over flowing every where on on floor in their rooms. This is a great solution to hide their stuff animals, keep them away from dust, make the room looks much cleaner and also it serves as a bean chair which my boys claimed comfortable to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: C4

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure what to expect size wise because some reviews said it holds tons and other were underwhelmed that it didn’t hold everything. We got the large just to be sure and it fit all the animals and all the small blankets in my sons room! The fabric is strong and thick and seems very durable. I would recommend or buy again because of the quality. And I love that it gives the stuffed animals a place to be out of sight but they are still accessible to my son. I only wish I had heard of these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: A. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I bought the giant one because we have so many stuffed animals! It want even full all the way. I finally bought a second one because we have a million blankets! I didn't find the blankets, I just stuffed them in. This is holding several King size blankets, a bunch of baby blankets and other things and it's still not full! I have more storage now and my house isn't covered in stuffed animals! Win win!
customer_reviews.author: freelinerunner

customer_reviews.title: You will not go wrong. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to HATE when people would give my son stuffed animal. He wanted to keep them all. Now with this bag I have a nice place to put them. He also has so many blankets that just sat in his closet never being used. Even though I can’t see them it makes me happy they are being used in some way. My son loves his bag and loves to pull it out when we watch movies. This is seriously the best thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn queen

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING IS THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is freakin' AMAZING! I got the biggest one and it fit over 100 stuffed animals! How awesome is it that it's a comfy seat and ALSO a discreet place to keep the tons of stuffed animals my kids have. Whoever invented this is a genius!! Only one thing to keep in mind and it's not necessarily a negative thing but simply worth noting: it gets REALLY heavy with all those plushies in there! But it does have a handle so I can lift it, but my 6 year old can not.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Stuffed animal storage bean bag chair
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to store my daughters stuffed animals that were driving me crazy all over her room. This holds all of them perfectly and it turns into a pretty comfy bean bag chair. I wish the material was a little thicker and softer, but it’s definitely durable. The zipper is nice and smooth and we haven’t had any issues with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: XL fits a LOT!
customer_reviews.text: 4 trash bags of stuffed animals in the XL and we still have room! This is a perfect transition piece for my 10 yo. She isn’t yet ready to part with all her beanie babies and stuffed animals collected this last decade but she wants a more modern and teen looking room. This is perfect! Even the cat loves it :)
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning up and storing stuffed animals fun!
customer_reviews.text: These things are genius! My kids love putting in their animals so they can sit and magically the stuffed animal mess is gone! Plus they hold a lot of stuffed animals! This is actually my second one ordered for my daughter because she was mad her brother had one and she did not! Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome way to store grandchildren toys.
customer_reviews.text: I recently found the box of Beanie Babies from my grown children’s childhood. I asked them if they wanted them for their own children. They felt they already had too many toys everywhere so I bought one of these to store them and provide a great little cozy seat for my grandchildren when they visit. They were so excited when they saw the treasure inside their bean bag chair. I bought a second one as a baby shower gift. They are extremely well made, high quality. Great purchase, speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: GMBM

customer_reviews.title: Great materials that is heavy yet comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 bags for full price and will be coming back for more (for the stuffed animals I intended them for). Great materials that is heavy yet comfortable. The zipper is well encased so not visible. I am using the smaller size to store extra bedding (king size down comforter and 2 pillows). Perfect use as an ottoman. Even the dog likes to lie on it! I do wish solid colors and a navy/white stripe were available. I cannot wait to give the stuffed animals a more permanent home!
customer_reviews.author: SherylinRI

customer_reviews.title: Daughter highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wanted extra seating for his playroom. I told my daughter I'd be happy to buy it for him. At her request this was the only one she'd like me to buy. She has one already and it works really well for her so she was happy for me to buy a second. I was able to get it in a complimentary color to the one they currently have. It's for Christmas so it's not been opened yet, but I'm positive it will be well received.
customer_reviews.author: A fan of classics,

customer_reviews.title: Say bye to nets!
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea! I purchased two of these for my daughters. Like you I noticed the mountain of stuffed animals accumulating in each of their rooms and around the house. I'm not a fan of the corner wall nets. They look terrible and do nothing but collect dust. So when I found this I was ecstatic and had to purchase 2 of the large ones. I was able to fit all of their stuffed animals inside minus the ones with hard plastic attached. Great alternative to the nets. Plus it adds a nice accent peice to the house.
customer_reviews.author: RoNiNLSJ

customer_reviews.title: The BEST storage for stuffed animals
customer_reviews.text: I did alot of research on storage for stuffed animals - some are important gifts from milestones in life and some my daughter just "cant live without," lol! Well, this was the BEST option, she now has a bean bag chair to lounge on in her playroom and it matches the decor. I did not want one of those hanging nets - ugly, lol. Thanks, this is the exactly what we needed and was huge!! She fit about 50-60 "stuffies" in there.
customer_reviews.author: nurseheather83

customer_reviews.title: Just go ahead and buy it!  Hide all the stuffed animals!
customer_reviews.text: Just go ahead and get this. I have a butt ton of stuffed animals in this beanbag. I wish I had this a long time ago. This is an extra large. I was able to add another toy chest full of animals and it’s no way full. We use to have the stuffed animals boxed up, and she would keep 20 out. Every so often she would trade them out. And as we got more they would go into the storage box over time. I have now put them all in this bag. Yay! I always felt like we’re her toys and she should get to play with them, but they were just overwhelming. I’m so happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unique way to organize stuffed animals.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute way to store all those stuffed animals laying around the house. My son lives to tuck his animals in the beanbag for safe keeping. I love this idea; however, if you have wood floors and pets like us the white shows dirt and dog hair easily. My son won’t sit on the beanbag because it feels too “lumpy,” but at least everything is off the floors and he will use it for a crash pad.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea
customer_reviews.text: Received the Pillow and it's just what we wanted. Our daughter loves it and we like it because it gets all the stuffed animals out of the way. We got the larger size but I wish we had gotten the smaller one because the big one is really big. If you don't fill it entirely with stuffed animals you really can't sit on it. We actually had to get stuffed animals out of the basement that we had retired just so it could be full enough to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: MD 2020

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I got the small one thinking I may have to buy another because it may be too small. Which was OK because I have two little ones. Well let's just say its not even full... Now I may have to buy another for our extra blankets. I don't know why anyone wouldn't buy this??? Great quality, lots of room and cute patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Porshamarie7

customer_reviews.title: they are awesome!! Was so sick and tired of having ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered four of them and let me tell you, they are awesome!! Was so sick and tired of having stuffed animals all over the house and all over the room now when we clean up, we just stuff all the stuffed animals in there. Honestly a great product, Nice thick material, the handle is thick, nice stitch, the zipper is rubber dipped so it’s not sharp, machine washable totally worth the money. I ordered four of the smaller size wish I would’ve ordered two small and two bigger for my older kids (8&9) I will probably invest in more at a later time
customer_reviews.author: Beachside Dreams

customer_reviews.title: So many possibilities!
customer_reviews.text: This bean bag storage chair was given as a gift to my child, but it is serving double-duty! I love the way it collects all those stuffed animals that rarely get played with, yet my daughter cannot live without. I have a college-aged daughter too and am considering getting her one to store extra bedding and even out of season clothing in. It is super cute, I ordered the gray and white striped one and it looks just like the picture. It has a nice quality zipper and handle built-in also. I am very pleased and will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Clean room!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is wonderful. The material is nice and thick. The handle I was afraid would not manage with as many stuffed animals as we shoved in it, but it is great quality. I couldn’t believe how many stuffies this thing held. My 4 year old loves his animals but they were taking over his room. Now he has a nice chair to play on. He can open and “dump” all of his animals out, play and then have fun making his chair again. Warning, it isn’t light when filled but it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Rebic

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best invention ever. I love things that serve 2 purposes. I bought the larger size. We do not have what I would consider a huge collection of stuffed animals, more of a moderate-sized collection of stuffed animals. What we had did not fill the bean bag so I added spare pillows. Once filled, I immediately breathed a huge sigh of relief. Instantly, the house felt more free of clutter. This particular brand also is a great quality. We have had no rips and the material feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: D J Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Big, durable & stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a solution for all my daughters stuffed animals and when I found these I knew my search was over! I bought the small and the large since there was mixed reviews about sizes. I have to say their both great. The small holds quite a bit and is perfect size for her, she’s 4. The large is so big I was able to put extra blankets she had as well. I got the grey stripes, which are neutral enough to be in any room of the house and goes with everything. I love these! And may order a set for grandmas house next ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Angela May

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!!!! Best purchase ever! My kids have so many stuffed animals and throw blankets, it makes their room look messy and cluttered even when it’s picked up. I ordered 2 of the extra large, they arrived fast and very well packaged. Material is great, will last for many years. We could not believe how many stuffed animals and throw blankets these could hold! Amazing! Very, very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped Wrangle in the Many Stuffed Animals
customer_reviews.text: This product was a godsend. My daughter's stuffed animals were slowly taking over the house, and now they are nice and organized. She loves to dig through and find one to play with, and it's become part of our routine to tuck them all in at night. So glad I purchased this and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect solution! They now have a place to sit ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my girls for Christmas. They have a ton of stuffed animals/dolls and blankets that are usually all over the floor! This is the perfect solution! They now have a place to sit and their "friends" aren't all over the floor anymore. Everyone who has been over at our house since Christmas has commented on them and on what a neat idea this is. I love these so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Jillene A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to a messy kids room!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing. It was recommended by a coworker when I was complaining about how messy my daughters room was. It works great! Fits a ton of stuffed animals, we even threw some of her blankets in. She loves to sit and read on it, and she can easily pick up her stuffed animals and throw them in when she's done playing. Worth every penny. I'm going to get one for my son now too :) Bonus that the pink stripes are super cute. Very highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: julieb

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I am overly happy about this bean bag! The zipper is high quality!! The amount of stuffed abimals I can fit in the XL is incredible and I still have room for me. It is really easy for my eight year old to use. I bet younger could as well. And it's a comfy, decorative chair for my kiddos room.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay3

customer_reviews.title: Mom's Stuffed Animal Nightmare Solution
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever felt that your kids own more stuffed animals than Wal-Mart? Do you spend more time picking up stuffed animals and figuring out where your child will sleep on their bed than you do on their college fund? This is the solution for you! I purchased one for my 13 yo daughter and another for my 7 yo son because I was at my wit's end. The kids immediately filled up the bags and commented that they are quite comfy to use. The bags seem well constructed (as opposed to some cheaper options with poor reviews), and I've washed and dried on with no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good to believe!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews but this thing is awesome!!! I got the XL- and it is HUGE! Such great quality material and holds all my kids’ stuffed animals while still feeling like a comfy chair! We were looking for a bean bag chair for my boys’ room but they were so expensive. Found this online and decided to give it a try- not disappointed at all!!!! Comfy seating AND storage that is affordable??? It is almost too good to believe! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: James H Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size bag but delay in shipping
customer_reviews.text: I'm taking 1 point off because I placed my order using Prime on September 6th and the bag was not delivered until September 26th. This was a present so that's why I needed it to be on time. I was informed of the delay a couple of days after placing the order, was told I could cancel the order at that time if I wanted to but I couldn't find another bag this size so I decided not to cancel. The bag was perfect and bigger than any other bags I have seen out there so I'm glad I waited.
customer_reviews.author: Misbell

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this! Good quality and fits a ton
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! If you found this after searching for something to contain your child's ridiculous amount of stuffed animals - trust me buy it. I fit about 8 normal sized stuffed animals plus an enormous teddy bear that is the size of my 3 year old. All of it fit perfectly inside, and it zipped fine. It's durable, the zipper is durable and my son loves to jump on it. It's got a handle to help carry it and everything. Definitely a good product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes and it surpassed them
customer_reviews.text: Colors are as nice as the photos. The material is thick enough it should survive the kids. My only caution is to pay attention to the size. I ordered the largest because we had a ton of stuffed animals. It was huge! I assumed I would need to buy another one if i liked it, but I ended up putting a pillow in it to fill it up.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought one for my 7 year old and one for my 16 year old. It holds SOOOO much. We just moved and we stuffed extra blankets in this along with all the stuffed animals they usually keep in it. My 7 year old drags it down the stairs to watch movies or play video games and then drags it back upstairs by herself. The material is thick so it holds up to all of that abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Thompson

customer_reviews.title: strong
customer_reviews.text: used this to put all stuffed animals and less space and yet have seat in the room. both kids have one of their own and they loved it. unfortunately it not waterproof so you will have to wash if got ruin. so if you toys in it and it will get wet. I do not allow kids have food or drink in their toy room.
customer_reviews.author: Heather St Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Multiple sizes, so sturdy, the material is canvas thick, durable zipper and material handle. I hoped for quality but didnt expect it, these by Far surpassed my expectations! I actually thought I ordered the stool size and ordered huge bags, huge, large enough for adult! I'd recommend these for kids, adults, college dorms, everyone in all decor! Fast shipping. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shade

customer_reviews.title: Beanless Been bag
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this for 1 week. The durability is yet to be tested. It's thick cordura material appears to be sturdy and well sewn. We've maxed out the bag capacity with all my kids stuffed animals so far. Other than the slight lumpyness, it's comfortable and my son likes to lounge on it with he reads. If it's not filled enough, the toys spread out and you end up sitting on the floor through the bag which defeats the purpose, and it's uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Chirish

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the greatest inventions !!! My grandsons room was totally overloaded with stuffed animals and pillows. What a great way to declutter but also be able to open up the seat and choose which toy he wanted. It washes very well to as you all know toddlers spill and he did the 2nd day we had it. Washed in cold water with Oxy on the stain on the inside and out. Highly recommend and the service was quick !!!
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: 2nd order
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my 2nd one. The first one arrived yesterday. These are awesome. Durable and a ton of stuffed animals if various sizes fit in. My 7yr old son thought it was awesome that he had a bean bag chair of stuffed animals. My kids originally had the net which my husband always disliked. My son's net gave way due to the number of stuffed animals and started pulling out of the wall. Which caused me to go on a search for something else. As soon as my husband saw the bag he said order another one so our daughter can have one too. Way better then the net. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: WalkOn

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously amazing! Not only does it store our massive collection of blankets, it also provides endless entertainment to our young daughters who believe they’re gymnastics superstars. You should see the flips they do over this thing! They love sitting on it and playing on it. It’s made very well and I can see it lasting a long time...even with the wear and tear it endures on a daily basis. I’m debating on buying another for their bedroom. My only regret was that I didn’t know about these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: JenW

customer_reviews.title: Must have if your house is over run with stuffies!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I wished I'd found this sooner!! My 13 year old can't bear to part with her stuffies! Toys no problem, but not the stuffies! She has hundreds of them...all shapes & sizes, that were just everywhere in our finished basement. Once a toy sanctuary, but now becoming more of a teen hangout area. So got 2 of these and presto...no more mess & extra seats for her friends!! We just got them but they seem to be very high quality! Highly recommend if you are run over with stuffies! I'm ordering another one to put all the extra pillows & blankets we have for when her friends sleep over!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Stores a lot
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bean bag for stuffed animals because it stores so many and they’re out of the way (floor), but I will say it’s not really something I want to sit on. Stuffed animals are lumpy at best. However, I’d absolutely buy it again for storage
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Stuffed animals have a new home
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. We did a Tidying Up of the playroom and although many, many toys were able to find new homes, the stuffed animals brought too much joy to send them away. This was a perfect solution. My daughter had decided to rotate a few out at a time so that every stuffed animal still gets loved. :). We lived it so much, we ended up buying 2. I've even considered getting another to hold pillows or blankets when not in use. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Nicci

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, pretty, holds a lot more than expected
customer_reviews.text: We fit 2 13 gallon trash bags of stuffed animals into one 27 inch beanbag! We had ordered the bag before going through their toys and thought we'd definitely have to order another but it all fit! The colors on the flower pattern are nice and bright too, it's perfect for our living room. The construction is a lot sturdier than I was expecting too. Overall it was definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: NorthwestGirl

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my kids, and it may have been a little bit more than we needed. These things are huge, I bought a large and 2 xl and with the animals we had laying out and a couple of pillows we managed to fill one xl, now to round up the rest to see if we can fill the other 2. As long as you don't fill it with things that have hard electronic parts it's really pretty comfortable, and the material feels super sturdy, and I think it might actually survive the toddler. I would definitely recommend these for anyone that has a ton of stuffed animals the kids won't give up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, washable and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this product! It's durable material that is machine washable. The zipper is sturdy. My kids love the handle that makes it easy to take it from room to room. I purchased the large size and it fits an entire twin size down comforter and then some. Love this idea: we store extra blankets, winter scarves and gloves inside them and it's plenty comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Chavez707

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: The storage bean bag is great for storage but may not be comfortable to sit on. We have stuffed animals in ours and it's very lumpy. With blankets it's not bad though. Looks great and is a very sturdy material. We got both sizes of bag and I prefer the smaller because the extra large bag takes up so much space in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Naynay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage solution!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this thing. I bought a large grey one for my son and a smaller hot pink one for my daughter. I love the stripes! They hold a lot of stuffed animals and are pretty comfortable to sit on. It's definitely better than having them in a pile gathering dust. My kids were a little sas about putting their animals in but I showed them how to get out the ones they want. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Odom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Brilliant idea!
customer_reviews.text: LOVVVVVE THIS! I bought another brand similar to this and it was crap! It smelled like chemicals and the material was cheap! This one is very good quality! It did not smell like a chemical factory at all and the material is thick and durable. I have two boys who end up in a pillow fight with seat cushions of any kind. They can’t pick this one up because it’s so big! Which I like! All their stuffies fit into it and clean up is easy! We have used it for extra living room seating on many ocassions!
customer_reviews.author: Djriise

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased the stripped green and white one and realized another would be needed so I then ordered the flower printed one. They are very cool and my kids love it. At first they thought it was cruel to be sitting on all of their "friends" but they quickly got over it. I did notice that the flower pattern is smaller than the green one and there is a difference. They were both listed as the same size but thats not the case. I'm ordering another one bc we have more animals and they don't all fit.
customer_reviews.author: sallybeans

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can not stand have a bunch of stuffies all over the house that no one really plays with, but also don't want to get rid of. This is fantastic.. I bought 2. It's over sized and has a durable zipper. We stuff all the stuffies in there and the kids always lay and sit on the chair. It's great. No one realizes that it's not a regular bean bag until they sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Best invention yet!!! I absolutely love it!!! You can put anything in it!! I put the kid's stuffed animals and a few blankets in it and zipped it up. Durability is amazing too, it's thick canvas like material. I LOVE them and I know that you will too!!! It's worth every penny!!!I I'll be back for at least 3 more!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice, Sturdy, HUGE, and definitely holds a lot. I thought we had a lot of stuffed animals until we ran out trying to fill this bag. The kids love to jump on it and drag it around the house so at least it's functional when full. Colors are as vibrant as they appear on line. Sturdy zip closer too. If I had to give you a rough guesstimate on size/capacity..... imagine it taking up about a full 1/3 - 1/2 of a twin bed.Yes, that's how big the XL bag it is. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, super durable
customer_reviews.text: The XL fit even more than I thought it would. There is still space after my daughters bedroom full of stuffed animals. The kids and dogs have wrestled on it already and it still looks perfect. Love the durable handle, makes it very easy to transport. I have to admit I was skeptical but after I saw how great it was I bought another for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing was awesome quality and fit every single one of my daughters stuffed animals including her 3 1/2 foot bear. This thing is HUGE! I got the extra large because she has so many stuffed animals and now I wish I wouldn't have gone so big - I may need to buy her more stuffed animals (I kid).
customer_reviews.author: Chadlee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very skeptical because my dauther have to many stuffed animals, but when I got it, it was magical. I put almost 90 stuffed animals in a variety of shape and forms. I used to has a hammock but this is way better. I’m planning on buying another one for the baby’s room because I still have teddies around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Teycha M. Texeira

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This item is a must buy!!!!! Great product and my children love these. It’s easy to wash and great for my girls to sleep on as well as use for movie night. The only thing I didn’t configure is how heavy it is when we over do it with blankets but it’s so worth it. I will purchase these again but different sizes. This was a great invention!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

product_meta.title: Creative QT Stuffed Animal Storage Bean Bag Chair - Extra Large Stuff 'n Sit Organization for Kids Toy Storage - Available in a Variety of Sizes and Colors (38", Grey/White Striped)
feature_bullets: MADE TO LAST - With our kids bean bag Lifetime Guarantee, you never need to worry about quality issues. Our amazingly strong and soft material and heavy duty zipper and handle are made to last throughout childhood.

HOLDS MANY STUFFED ANIMALS - Approximately 38 inches in diameter when full. This roomy home for your stuffies means that your little ones never have to say good-bye to another one of their plush friends.

STORES MORE THAN STUFFED ANIMALS - If your home is anything like ours, stuffed animal toy storage is just the tip of the decluttering iceberg. This pouf chair stores extra throw pillows, blankets, favorite dress up costumes, anything soft and comfy.

HIDE THE CLUTTER AND DO IT IN STYLE - Our stylish stuffed animal storage organizers help you take control of your entire stuffed animal collection. Simply fill and zip your floor pouf to create a plush, stuffed animal bean bag chair in a matter of minutes.

THE FIRST AND STILL THE BEST - Creative QT is the original developer of the Stuffed Animal Storage Bean Bag. Our continued committment to product quality and your satisfaction makes us the still the best for your money.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars5,477 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
